title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 177 - Provision Of Services To Pupils Attending Nonpublic Schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 177 - Provision Of Services To Pupils Attending Nonpublic Schools

State Regulations
§ 177.1 - Services to pupils attending nonpublic schools
§ 177.2 - Claim by a school district to recover costs for special education provided to non-resident students pursuant to education law, section 3602-c(2)
§ 177.3 to 177.6 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 177

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 3208[1]-[5], 3214[3], 3602-c, 3713[1][2], 4002[1]-[3], 4308[3], 4355[3], 4401[1]- [11], 4402[1]-[7], 4403[3], 4404[1]-[5], 4404-a[1]-[7], 4410 [13]; L. 2007, ch. 378, § 4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
